abstracts.cdata!:
The Education Sector Consolidation
            Project will help to sustain the momentum of far reaching
            educational policy reforms and to implement a core package
            of critically needed investment. This integrated program of
            reforms and investments aims at reshaping the unbalanced
            Malian education system, improving its performance and
            relevance and promoting a more cost effective use of scarce
            sectoral resources. Principally, this will be achieved by
            expanding access to primary education, but also by
            developing a viable option for secondary & higher
            education.   It will be hybrid in nature, consisting of,
            first, a quick disbursing element to be released in three
            yearly tranches against implementation of a sectoral
            adjustment program. Secondly, it will include an investment
            element focusing on primary education and the management of
            sectoral resources.
